author: Special Correspondent
text:
A 22-year-old youth committed suicide by jumping off the terrace of his house in Hulimavu on Wednesday. The deceased has been identified as Mohan Sagar.

A B.Com. graduate, Sagar jumped from the fifth floor after having failed to secure a job despite attending interviews.

Depressed

Police sources said that Sagar had gone into depression after he was unable to find a job.

Sagar’s father is bedridden and his mother, a teacher at a private school, is the sole breadwinner of the family.

On Wednesday, Sagar, who had to gone to buy vegetables, had spoken to his friends and returned home.

Later, he went to the terrace and jumped to his death, the police said. Passers-by rushed Sagar to a private hospital, where he was declared dead on arrival.

Case registered

The Hulimavu police have registered a case and are investigating.
title: Unemployed youth jumps off building, dies
